markdownRemark.html:
Poof a website has appeared!

Cool right?

I actually had a website before this. It looked kinda similar with the same colors and footer. The header was a little different, but the rest was remade.

Why?

Because I took a look at it and was like "Well, this website is actually awful" and so I remade it.

The old website can be found here if you really want to see it

frontmatter.title: Look ma I made a website
